attributes.action: Give a helping hand to First-Time Buyers!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am not interested in overpriced, shoe-box 'Luxury Apartments'. I am not interested in 'Shared Ownership' (a result of excessive house prices, not a solution to them). I also do not wish to be forced into a ridiculous 6x + mortgage, on an average wage, just to be able to get on the property ladder.

Would the government please scrap or, at the very least, increase the Stamp Duty threshold; build decent, affordable housing which is banned from Buy-to-Let investors and build enough of these types of accommodation in order to help meet today's demand.
